*/ , A.pad_bfhn_no , A.prvi_bfhn_no , A.bfcy_idfy_no /** NIF du bénéficiaire */ , A.bfcy_cmrc_regs_no /** Registre de commerce du bénéficiaire */ , FN_GET_CD_VDVAL_NM('CLR_0137', A.DLNG_PYMN_MEAN_CD, #{langCd}) AS DLNG_PYMN_MEAN_NM , (SELECT NVL(MAX(PDLS_NO), '0') FROM TB_CLRI_DED_PDLS WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND DTL_DCSH_NO NOT IN (SELECT DTL_DCSH_NO FROM TB_CLRI_DED_COMN WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND PRCS_STTS_CD = 'A01') ) AS MAX_PDLS_NO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(PRNG_PDLS_NO), '0') FROM TB_CLRI_DED_RIMEX_PRNG_PDLS WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND DTL_DCSH_NO NOT IN (SELECT DTL_DCSH_NO FROM TB_CLRI_DED_COMN WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND PRCS_STTS_CD = 'A01')) AS MAX_PRNG_PDLS_NO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(CNTR_SRNO), 0) FROM TB_CLRI_DED_CNTR WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND DTL_DCSH_NO NOT IN (SELECT DTL_DCSH_NO FROM TB_CLRI_DED_COMN WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND PRCS_STTS_CD = 'A01')) AS MAX_CNTR_SRNO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(ATCH_DOC_SRNO), 0) FROM TB_CLRI_DED_ATDOC WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND DTL_DCSH_NO NOT IN (SELECT DTL_DCSH_NO FROM TB_CLRI_DED_COMN WHERE DTL_DCSH_NO = A.DTL_DCSH_NO AND PRCS_STTS_CD = 'A01')) AS MAX_ATCH_DOC_SRNO FROM TB_CLRI_DED_COMN A WHERE del_yn = 'N' /** Suppression ON !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.dtl_dcsh_no = #{dtlDcshNo} /** Numero de la déclaration en détail!! !== 상세신고서번호 ==! */ LIMIT 1
/* ClriDpsOfat_selectDivdNtfcCnt */ SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TB_COLI_NTFC WHERE REFF_NO = #{dtlDcshNo} AND NTFC_PT_CD = 'E' AND RCVE_YN = 'N' AND CNCL_YN = 'N' AND NTFC_PRCS_STTS_CD = 'H01'

*/ , A.pdls_otcst_amt /** Montant Des Autres Frais De L'Article !== 품목기타비용금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_otcst_curr_cd /** Code De Devise Des Autres Frais De L'Article !== 품목기타비용통화코드 ==! */ , A.pdls_otcst_fxrt /** Taux De Change Des Autres Frais De L'Article !== 품목기타비용환율 ==! */ , A.pdls_otcst_ncy_amt /** Montant Ncy Des Autres Frais De L'Article !== 품목기타비용NCY금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_ddct_amt /** Montant Déduit De L'Article !== 품목공제금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_no /** N° D'Article !== 품목번호 ==! */ , A.pdls_ddct_curr_cd /** Code De Devise Déduit De L'Article !== 품목공제통화코드 ==! */ , A.pdls_ddct_fxrt /** Taux De Change De La Déduction De L'Article !== 품목공제환율 ==! */ , A.pdls_ddct_ncy_amt /** Montant Ncy Déduit De L'Article !== 품목공제NCY금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_txbs_ncy_amt /** Montant Nyc De La Base Taxable De L'Article !== 품목과세기준NCY금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_txbs_usd_amt /** Montant Usd De La Base Taxable De L'Article !== 품목과세기준USD금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_vlut_ncy_amt /** Montant Ncy De L'Évaluation De Valeur De L'Article !== 품목가격평가NCY금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_vlut_usd_amt /** Montant Usd De L'Évaluation De Valeur De L'Article !== 품목가격평가USD금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_mprc_base_val /** Valeur basique de la valeur boursière de l'article !== 품목시장가격기준값 ==! */ , A.pdls_mprc_ut_amt /** Montant unitaire de la valeur boursière de l'article !== 품목시장가격단위금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_mprc_ncy_amt /** Montant NCY de la valeur boursière de l'article !== 품목시장가격NCY금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_invc_amt /** Montant De La Facture De L'Article !== 품목송장금액 ==! */ , A.del_yn /** Suppression On !== 삭제여부 ==! */ , A.frst_regst_id /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== 최초등록자ID ==! */ , A.frst_rgsr_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== 최초등록일시 ==! */ , A.last_chpr_id /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== 최종변경자ID ==! */ , A.last_chg_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== 최종변경일시 ==! */ , A.pdls_invc_curr_cd /** Code De Devise De La Facture De L'Article !== ==! */ , A.pdls_invc_fxrt /** Taux De Change De La Facture De L'Article !== 품목송장환율 ==! */ , A.pdls_invc_ncy_amt /** Montant Ncy De La Facture De L'Article !== 품목송장NCY금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_invc_usd_amt /** Montant Usd De La Facture De L'Article !== 품목송장USD금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_cach_amt /** Montant Du Fret De L'Article !== 품목운임금액 ==! */ , A.pdls_cach_curr_cd /** Code De Devise Du Fret De L'Article !== 품목운임통화코드 ==! */ , A.pdls_cach_fxrt /** Taux De Change Du Fret De L'Article !== 품목운임환율 ==! */ FROM TB_CLRI_DED_VLUT_PDLS A WHERE del_yn = 'N' /** Suppression ON !== 삭제여부 ==! */ AND A.dtl_dcsh_no = #{dtlDcshNo} /** Numero de la déclaration en détail!! !== 상세신고서번호 ==! */ ORDER BY TO_NUMBER(A.PDLS_NO)
mapper.insert: /* insertClrDedPrcDclrPdls */ INSERT INTO TB_CLRI_DED_PRC_DCLR_PDLS ( dtl_dcsh_no /** Numero de la déclaration en détail!! !== ==! */ , pdls_no /** N° D'Article !== ==! */ , mdl_stsz_no /** N° De Modèle Et Spécification !== 모델규격번호(PK) ==! */ , pcfe_amt /** Montant de la redevance !== 구매수수료를 제외한 수수료 ==! */ , mdtn_pcfe_amt /** Frais de courtage !== 중개수수료 ==! */ , pckg_amt /** Contenants et emballages !== 용기 및 포장 ==! */ , mnfu_srvc_1_amt /** Frais de produits et services 1 !== 제품 및 서비스 비용 ==! */ , mnfu_srvc_2_amt /** Frais de produits et services 2 !== ==! */ , mnfu_srvc_3_amt /** Frais de produits et services 3 !== ==! */ , mnfu_srvc_4_amt /** Frais de produits et services 4 !== ==! */ , pcfe_lcne_amt /** Montant de la redevance !== 수수료 및 라이센스 ==! */ , resale_ern_amt /** Produit de revente !== 재판매 수익 ==! */ , trnp_cst_amt /** Frais de transporåt !== 운송비용 ==! */ , load_cst_amt /** Frais de chargement !== 적재비용 ==! */ , infee_amt /** Montant D'Assurance !== 보험료 ==! */ , brng_trnp_cst /** Frais de chargement et de manutention !== 반입 운송비용 ==! */ , tech_sppt_cst /** Frais de soutiens techniques !== 기술지원비용 ==! */ , otcst_amt /** Montant Des Autres Coûts !== 기타비용 ==! */ , pyr_trif_amt /** Montant de droits et taxes !== 관세 및 제새액 ==! */ , del_yn /** Suppression On !== ==! */ , frst_regst_id /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== ==! */ , frst_rgsr_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== ==! */ , last_chpr_id /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== ==! */ , last_chg_dttm /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== ==! */ , byer_pymn_cst /** Frais chargé à l'acheteur !== 구매자부담비용 ==! */ , indr_pymn_tamt /** paiement indirect !== 간접비용 ==! */ ) VALUES ( #{dtlDcshNo} /** Numero de la déclaration en détail!! !== ==! */ , #{pdlsNo} /** N° D'Article !== ==! */ , #{mdlStszNo} /** N° De Modèle Et Spécification !== 모델규격번호(PK) ==! */ , #{pcfeAmt} /** Montant de la redevance !== 구매수수료를 제외한 수수료 ==! */ , #{mdtnPcfeAmt} /** Frais de courtage !== 중개수수료 ==! */ , #{pckgAmt} /** Contenants et emballages !== 용기 및 포장 ==! */ , #{mnfuSrvc1Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 1 !== 제품 및 서비스 비용 ==! */ , #{mnfuSrvc2Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 2 !== ==! */ , #{mnfuSrvc3Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 3 !== ==! */ , #{mnfuSrvc4Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 4 !== ==! */ , #{pcfeLcneAmt} /** Montant de la redevance !== 수수료 및 라이센스 ==! */ , #{resaleErnAmt} /** Produit de revente !== 재판매 수익 ==! */ , #{trnpCstAmt} /** Frais de transporåt !== 운송비용 ==! */ , #{loadCstAmt} /** Frais de chargement !== 적재비용 ==! */ , #{infeeAmt} /** Montant D'Assurance !== 보험료 ==! */ , #{brngTrnpCst} /** Frais de chargement et de manutention !== 반입 운송비용 ==! */ , #{techSpptCst} /** Frais de soutiens techniques !== 기술지원비용 ==! */ , #{otcstAmt} /** Montant Des Autres Coûts !== 기타비용 ==! */ , #{pyrTrifAmt} /** Montant de droits et taxes!== 관세 및 제새액 ==! */ , 'N' /** Suppression On !== ==! */ , #{frstRegstId} /** Id Du Premier Enregistrant !== ==! */ , SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date Et Heure De Premier Enregistrement !== ==! */ , #{lastChprId} /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== ==! */ , SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== ==! */ , NVL(#{byerPymnCst}, 0) /** Frais chargé à l'acheteur !== 구매자부담비용 ==! */ , #{indrPymnTamt} /** paiement indirect !== 간접비용 ==! */ ) ON CONFLICT ( dtl_dcsh_no,pdls_no,mdl_stsz_no ) DO UPDATE SET pcfe_amt = #{pcfeAmt} /** Montant de la redevance !== 구매수수료를 제외한 수수료 ==! */ ,mdtn_pcfe_amt = #{mdtnPcfeAmt} /** Frais de courtage !== 중개수수료 ==! */ ,pckg_amt = #{pckgAmt} /** Contenants et emballages !== 용기 및 포장 ==! */ ,mnfu_srvc_1_amt = #{mnfuSrvc1Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 1 !== 제품 및 서비스 비용 ==! */ ,mnfu_srvc_2_amt = #{mnfuSrvc2Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 2 !== ==! */ ,mnfu_srvc_3_amt = #{mnfuSrvc3Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 3 !== ==! */ ,mnfu_srvc_4_amt = #{mnfuSrvc4Amt} /** Frais de produits et services 4 !== ==! */ ,pcfe_lcne_amt = #{pcfeLcneAmt} /** Montant de la redevance !== 수수료 및 라이센스 ==! */ ,resale_ern_amt = #{resaleErnAmt} /** Produit de revente !== 재판매 수익 ==! */ ,trnp_cst_amt = #{trnpCstAmt} /** Frais de transporåt !== 운송비용 ==! */ ,load_cst_amt = #{loadCstAmt} /** Frais de chargement !== 적재비용 ==! */ ,infee_amt = #{infeeAmt} /** Montant D'Assurance !== 보험료 ==! */ ,brng_trnp_cst = #{brngTrnpCst} /** Frais de chargement et de manutention !== 반입 운송비용 ==! */ ,tech_sppt_cst = #{techSpptCst} /** Frais de soutiens techniques !== 기술지원비용 ==! */ ,otcst_amt = #{otcstAmt} /** Montant Des Autres Coûts !== 기타비용 ==! */ ,pyr_trif_amt = #{pyrTrifAmt} /** Montant de droits et taxes !== 관세 및 제새액 ==! */ ,last_chpr_id = #{lastChprId} /** Id Du Modificateur Final !== ==! */ , last_chg_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP /** Date Et Heure De Modification Finale !== ==! */ ,byer_pymn_cst = NVL(#{byerPymnCst}, 0) /** Frais chargé à l'acheteur !== 구매자부담비용 ==! */ ,indr_pymn_tamt = #{indrPymnTamt} /** paiement indirect !== 간접비용 ==! */
mapper.select:
/* ClriIbnVrfcBsop_selectCheckSadAtdocByEpc */ SELECT T1.ATCH_DOC_CD AS DOC_KND_CD , T2.pbls_itt_nm , FN_GET_DOC_NM(T1.ATCH_DOC_CD ,#{langCd}) AS DOC_KND_NM , '0' as PDLS_NO , T2.bfhn_sbmt_yn , 'Y' as INQT_DOC_YN FROM TB_CLRI_EPC_ATDOC T1, tb_clri_atdoc T2 WHERE T1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.EPC_CD = #{epcCd} AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.atch_doc_cd = T2.atch_doc_cd AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dclrDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T2.aply_strt_dt AND NVL(T2.aply_end_dt, '99991231') AND T2.del_yn = 'N' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CLRI_EPC_CD T3 WHERE T1.epc_cd = T3.epc_cd AND T1.epc_aply_strt_dt = T3.epc_aply_strt_dt AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dclrDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T3.EPC_APLY_STRT_DT AND T3.EPC_APLY_END_DT )
AND T2.bfhn_sbmt_yn = #{bfhnSbmtYn}
AND T1.SEA_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.RLRD_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.VHCL_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.FLGH_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.OTHS_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.atch_doc_cd != '600'
AND T1.atch_doc_cd != '610'

SELECT PDLS_NO, PBLS_ITT_NM, atch_doc_cd as DOC_NO, ATCH_DOC_CD AS DOC_KND_CD, FN_GET_DOC_NM(ATCH_DOC_CD, #{langCd}) AS DOC_KND_NM, 'Y' as INQT_DOC_YN, bfhn_sbmt_yn FROM ( /*********************************************************/ /* EPC 첨부문서 조회 */ /*********************************************************/ SELECT '0' as PDLS_NO, T2.pbls_itt_nm, T1.ATCH_DOC_CD, T2.bfhn_sbmt_yn FROM TB_CLRI_EPC_ATDOC T1, tb_clri_atdoc T2 WHERE T1.DEL_YN = 'N' AND T1.EPC_CD = #{epcCd} AND T1.USE_YN = 'Y' AND T1.atch_doc_cd = T2.atch_doc_cd AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dclrDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T2.aply_strt_dt AND NVL(T2.aply_end_dt, '99991231') AND T2.del_yn = 'N' AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TB_CLRI_EPC_CD T3 WHERE T1.epc_cd = T3.epc_cd AND T1.epc_aply_strt_dt = T3.epc_aply_strt_dt AND TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{dclrDt}, 'DD/MM/YYYY'),'YYYYMMDD') BETWEEN T3.epc_aply_strt_dt AND T3.epc_aply_end_dt )
AND T2.bfhn_sbmt_yn = #{bfhnSbmtYn}
AND T1.SEA_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.RLRD_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.VHCL_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.FLGH_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.OTHS_APLY_YN = 'Y'
AND T1.atch_doc_cd != '600'
AND T1.atch_doc_cd != '610'
) A

SELECT A.DTL_DCSH_NO , A.ATCH_DOC_SRNO , A.DOC_KND_CD , FN_GET_DOC_NM( A.doc_knd_cd, #{langCd}) AS DOC_KND_NM , A.PDLS_NO , A.DOC_NO , A.DOC_DESC , A.ATCH_FILE_NM , 'Y' AS RGSR_DOC_YN , A.PBLS_ITT_NM , TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(A.PBLS_DT, 'YYYYMMDD'),'DD/MM/YYYY') AS PBLS_DT , A.ATCH_FILE_ID FROM TB_CLRI_DED_ATDOC A WHERE A.dtl_dcsh_no = #{dtlDcshNo} AND A.DEL_YN = 'N' ORDER BY A.ATCH_DOC_SRNO
